caption: Beautiful and alluring.
Its okay
Delicious sandwiches! Service was adequate.

It is not the same. The FLAT IRON STEAK FRITES used to be delicious, but I ordered it for pick up lately and was not the same. The stake came poorly prepared, small and raw inside. The fries were not fresh either.

The bread pudding is out of this world.  I love if they did a dark chocolate sauce version of it too. The crab bisque soup is just right, great texture and taste.  The turkey sandwich is also another great choice with a wide of crispy fries and that olive sauce is something I've never had. Il have everything again.  Also price wise is absolutely affordable. I can tell my teens to go have lunch there rather than the food court on the mall.

This restaurant is a hidden spot inside Nordstrom in Aventura Mall. I like to go there because is cozy and not so crowded and everything is delicious! My favorite and highly recommended: the flat iron steak frites! Super yummy! The staff is super nice and friendly
I wish more people knew about this hidden gem in Aventura Mall! AMAZINGGGGGG. Never seems to disappoint and service is EXCELLENT, from the front staff to your waiter... LOVE IT!
the soups and bread puddings are great

Always safe, clean and delicious! Visiting during the pandemic everything was extra clean and all the safety measures were met.  They have the friendliest staff and the manager is awesome! The crab bisque and bread pudding are the BEST! My favorite place to have lunch in Aventura!
Love their food!
Good place for a drink
(Translated by Google) It is a very nice place to buy  (Original) Es un lugar muy bonito para comprar
Great coffee
Good coffee, good atmosphere.
Nice place for a shopping break
Very fresh food excellent service a hidden gem inside of nordstrom store on the 2nd floor... Super nice staff very friendly.
(Translated by Google) Excellent  (Original) Excelente

I was looking for a good chai tea latte and somebody told me about this coffee shop. And is true, they have the best chai tea latte in Miami. Until today. Is Saturday November 30, at 12:45 p.m. This bunch of kids,  have no idea what they are doing over there. Quality control has to be serious; in their recipe  and quantities. Because today my chai tea latte was  everything but a chai latte .😭very disappointed. And service is always very rude.  Management please!!! do something.  I really like  your chai tea latte and pound cakes. Thank you.
Better coffee than Starbucks.

Nice staff, had the french onion soup. It wasn't bad. I wish I could have eat more but I was not feeling so good while walking around the mall. Nice place hope to come back again and try some more food.
(Translated by Google) It is a nice little coffee, with good products and fast service.  (Original) Es un pequeño y simpático café , con buenos productos y rápido servicio .
(Translated by Google) Terrible attention  (Original) Terrible atención.
The lady Maria is so nice. And kind. She’s on point making sure everything’s okay.  With the food and the table i highly recommended her.  As a server.  She’s awesome👍👍👍

This cafe is great. Started with the crab bisque, and it was great. Soup is usually not my thing, but I gotta give them credit, this is a great soup. For an entree I had the club bistro, and it was quite the sandwich. I really enjoyed it. Lastly, if you like olives, you'll love the kalamata dip. I added it to my sandwich and ate it with my fries. The service was good too. It's on the pricey side for café, especially for a sandwich, but I can't say I was disappointed. I left satisfied and happy.
Really a great restaurant! Often overlooked by other restaurants in the mall, but this restaurant really has delicious food!!

This restaurant was a 5 star. Not sure what happened to it. The french onion soup was all spilled in the plate when it got the table, the french fries were cold, the burger was rare when ordered medium well. And even though the manager said they were going to make it up and give us a dessert, the dessert took 30 minutes to get to the table. We were about to leave when it got to the table. Disapointed with the overall experience.

(Translated by Google) I ordered a wash and they gave it to me cold, I went to claim and they gave me another one but just as cold and very sugary / I applied to wash and they gave me too cold, I went to claim and they changed me the coffee but again was too cold and got too much sugar  (Original) Pedí una colada y me la dieron fría, fui a reclamar y me volvieron a dar otra pero igual fría y muy azucarado / I apply a colada and they give me too cold, I went to claim and they change me the coffee but again was too cold and got too much sugar
Loved it , good fresh salad's salmon to die for and incredible service .
Great food
Excellent food when you're hungry from shopping. Everything on the menu is delicious❤

Ok so this place I’m giving it three stars because the staff is nice and the place is clean but they need to get it together . I walked in for lunch And asked for the cilantro lime shrimp salad and the girl at the register tells me that they ran out . They don’t have to make the vinaigrette because their truck didn’t come . What kind of excuse is that at 12:44pm on a Friday afternoon . To me that’s the managers fault or whoever is in charge because they didn’t order enough or whatever the case it made be .The line was also very long . They have one girl at the register . When is rush hour there should be more than one employee working so that you don’t have a backed up line with upset customers . The service is plain slow and they aren’t accommodating.
Good times there!
Best place to chill with friends. :)

I absolutely love this place. Its tucked in a corner of Nordstrom but its definitely a gem. Everyone is so nice and the food is amazing. Definitely a go to for a nice lunch. The manager Jorge is very accommodating and super professional. When you get there ask for Debra and thank me later!

This is my FAVORITE restaurant EVER! They are always consistent with their food. The service is perfect. Every time I come I get the best quality of food. The pizza is one of the best. Ceased salad is to die for. Their pasta is goals. For dessert I ALWAYS get Crème brûlée every time it is perfectly brûléed it is really good. What ever they are doing they shouldn’t change it. I come there twice every week. Never regretted coming there. I would give them 200 stars if I could
Great service and great atmosphere!
Excellent service.
Disappointed the Crisp Chicken is not abailable
Good

BEST Service, this was a perfect customer experience. The hostess asked if i was there to work (noting my laptop bag and need for wifi) so that she could find a reduced noise and cozy spot, then the waitress brought an extra glass of ice for my iced coffee since she knew it had just been brewed. Service was quick and hostess even quickly accommodate my use of an outlet to charge my phone! I wish every place had such intuitive, forward thinking staff!

Worse ever came with the family they ran out of lemonade then said they ran out of bread for my sandwich then said they ran out of bread for the table. Food management is terrible. Sad to see places fall apart.

The service at this Nordstrom bistro is always impeccable. My last time dining here, Dez and Justice were phenomenal, they went above and beyond to make sure that we had a great experience although it was close to closing. Also, the food was bomb!
every week they are switching up their menu. Went to get their salmon and the changed up the whole salmon. Very disappointed but hey they say their trying to go healthy. The pizza was good tho.

(Translated by Google) Terrible experience, we had to wait more than 20 minutes for food and then for dessert about 45 minutes, and when asking one of the waiters who made the order at the entrance why they took so long to serve us, he told us that it was because we had been late and everyone was waiting we were not the only ones, as who says it is our fault for being late! ??? No idea at any time they told us nothing that they were going to close or were closing, imagine We canceled the dessert order and they left us waiting for more than 15 minutes, they left us alone in the front I had to go find the Manager who did not apologize He didn't say anything, he just gave me the money back and now, Very bad experience, I don't recommend it !! I do not give any rating, and now at Aventura Mall that there are restaurants, and good customer service is everything. !!! What a pity!!  (Original) Terrible experiencia,  nos toco esperar mas de 20 minutos por la comida y luego al momento del postre unos 45 minutos, y al preguntarle a uno de los meseros que nos hizo el pedido a la entrada el por que tomaban tanto tiempo en atendernos nos dijo que era por que habiamos llegado tarde y todo el mundo estaba esperando no eramos los unicos, como quien dice es nuestra culpa por llegar tarde!  ??? Ni idea en ningun momento nos dijeron nada de que iban a cerrar o estaban cerrando,  imaginate Cancelamos la orden del postre y nos dejaron esperando mas de 15  minutos, nos dejaron solos en el frente me toco ir a buscar al Manager el cual ni se disculpo ni dijo nada solo me dio el dinero de vuelta y ya, Muy  mal experiencia, no lo recomiendo !! NO le doy ninguna calificacion,  y ahora en Aventura Mall que lo que hay son restaurantes, y buen servicio al cliente lo es todo.!!! Que pena!!
Pretty clean and neat cafe while shopping at nordstroms, one thing I will say if it's a little pricey for a smoothie around $8 but the coffee prices are average and really delicious too
Good service... Crappy food. Every plate I tasted it was like I was chewing plastic...

Absolutely love this place! Food is delicious, best French fries dip and Asian salad was great also. White chocolate pudding so tasty and delicious!!! Marcos was so nice and professional. Definitely will come back again ;)

(Translated by Google) It's excellent!!! The salads are delicious, the food is really delicious and the desserts are exquisite !! And the atmosphere is very nice! The attention very friendly and eager to make you feel welcome !!  (Original) Es excelente!!! Las ensaladas son deliciosas, la comida es realmente deliciosa y los postres son exquisitos!! Y el ambiente es muy agradable! La atención muy amables y con ganas de hacerte sentir bienvenido!!

Worst experience ever at this particular bistro. My dish was made incorrectly and instead of making a new dish the correct way they chose to recook my dish 3 TIMES!! How disgusting is that. Bobby did a horrible job making sure I was taken care of and after coming to this location for the past 4 years I will not be returning. What a waste of time and money.

Crab Macaroni and Cheese was amazing! Ftr I don't like bread pudding but i was persuaded to try the white chocolate version here. I cleaned my plate. My server was Jay; we told him that we popped in for a quick lunch and he was great!

Cafe Bistro is located inside the famous Nordstrom store in Aventura Mall. The menu changes according to the season and they use organic ingredients. It’s a family style restaurant and although it’s a bit loud with kids all around, you can eat there and avoid the usual hectic ambience of food courts at shopping centers. It is a very convenient place to go after a long day of shopping, the service is very efficient, the food met our expectations and the decoration is plain.
My server, i think Kaitlyn, couldnt have been nicer. Noticed I was thirsty, and gave me a water to go with my check.
They have a limited menu but everything they serve is super tasty and properly cooked. Love the french dip and always get the soup of the day.
(Translated by Google) I did not like  (Original) No me gusto
Good price
(Translated by Google) The coffee here tastes delicious and is not as expensive as Starbucks.  (Original) Der Kaffee schmeckt hier sehr lecker und ist nicht so teuer wie bei Starbucks .
Awesome place! Best pudding cake ever!
Love this place😍😍
Healthy fresh food! Management and staff are friendly and a tentative!
The food is excellent but the servers are sloths. They are so slow it makes you not want to come back! Would have given 4 stars if the servers aren't so slow.

Reasonable amount of waiting, friendly and helpful service, and very delicious food!  Given that you pay up front, though, tipping was very awkward.  How are you supposed to leave a tip?  Are you supposed to leave a tip?  I think the answers are: stuff cash in the little black folder.   And Yes.  But I wish Nordstrom's -- known for amazing service and talented employees -- would simply move to a tipless system, charging enough to pay all their waitstaff a salary and thus reduce the end-of-the-meal awkwardness here.
Just one hidden gem in a treasure chest of restaurants. Some items on the menu I cannot even pronounce. The best are the crab bisque and steak.
A hidden wonder! This place has a very fancy menu for a very reasonable price! The best plate is the steak sandwich! I get it every time! I really recommend it!
